content: edMalw`, `estimatedMazfm`, `structuralMatow`, `structuralMalw`, `structuralMazfm`, `structuralLcbTaxiWeight` and `efbTotalPayload` fields are within the scope of change data capture(see Mapping for details). **Predicted Wight:** * `legId` and `predictedPayload` fields are within the scope of change data capture(see Mapping for details). ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source File|Source Topic|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | | | |legId|                              |**Predicted Wight:** `predictedpayload`|**Predicted Wight:** `legId`|**OFP Weight:** Data Handling Operation| |estimatedMatow|`###-std.xml`| |`<FlightPlan>.<WeightHeader>.<TakeoffWeight>.<EstimatedWeight>.<Value unit="kg">###</Value>`| | |estimatedMalw|`###-std.xml`| |`<FlightPlan>.<WeightHeader>.<LandingWeight>.<EstimatedWeight>.<Value unit="kg">###</Value>`| | |estimatedMazfm|`###-std.xml`| |`<FlightPlan>.<WeightHeader>.<ZeroFuelWeight>.<EstimatedWeight>.<Value unit="kg">###</Value>`| | |structuralMatow|`###-std.xml`| |`<FlightPlan>.<WeightHeader>.<TakeoffWeight>.<StructuralLimit>.<Value unit="kg">###</Value>`| | |structuralMalw|`###-std.xml`| |`<FlightPlan>.<WeightHeader>.<LandingWeight>.<StructuralLimit>.<Value unit="kg">###</Value>`| | |structuralMazfm|`###-std.xml`| |`<FlightPlan>.<WeightHeader>.<ZeroFuelWeight>.<StructuralLimit>.<Value unit="kg">###</Value>`| | |structuralLcbTaxiWeight|`###-std.xml`| |`<FlightPlan>.<WeightHeader>.<lsya:WeightHeaderExtension>.<lsya:LCBTaxiWeightExtension>.<lsya:StructuralLimit>.<Value unit="kg">###</Value>`| | |efbTotalPayload|`###-std.xml`| |`<FlightPlan>.<WeightHeader>.<Load>.<EstimatedWeight>.<Value unit="kg">###</Value>`| | |predictedPayload| |`predictedPayload`|`predictedpayload`| | # Flight Plan Fuel Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * :paperclip:
